---------- TABLE INFO ------------

| Column 0 | Column 1 | Column 2          | Column 3                                                           | Column 4        | Column 5 |

| 'root'   | '%'      | 'no_password'     | ''                                                                 | 'account_admin' | 'YES'    |
| 'test'   | '%'      | 'no_password'     | ''                                                                 | ''              | 'NO'     |
| 'test1'  | '%'      | 'sha256_password' | '15e2b0d3c33891ebb0f1ef609ec419420c20e320ce94c65fbc8c3312448eb225' | 'role1'         | 'NO'     |
